assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: E.F.T. has received grant support to conduct clinical trials on SMA from Ionis/Biogen and serves as a consultant to Biogen, AveXis, Roche, Biologix, and Cytokinetics. The other author declares that she has no conflict of interest.
